channel.title: Need help 508 Pk Planet Source, with run.bat
channel.description:
Alright as you may have noticed many people are having problems with 508's runbat... Yeah so am I, I will give as much information as possible, except teamviewer or msn...
Pics [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/2hy84qv.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/hs0vpg.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/mh8s5z.jpg[/img]

item.title: Need help 508 Pk Planet Source, with run.bat
item.dc:creator: @pk_man_owned pk_man_owned
item.description:
@pk_man_owned wrote:

I have the correct Environmental Variables, it’s the first thing I do. ^^

I actually read tuts, http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html

Soo, the code I posted doesn’t work, so…

Next, the correct files…

Here’s the perfected code…(Which also doesn’t work.)

@echo off cd ../bin title Pk Planet "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\java.exe" -cp . PkPlanet/Server 43594 pause

If I input this…

@echo off Title Pk planet PATH=C:\ProgramFiles\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin; pause

This comes out

Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
item.source: Need help 508 Pk Planet Source, with run.bat

item.title: Need help 508 Pk Planet Source, with run.bat
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“pk_man_owned, post:3, topic:356105”]Finally someone answers, ok I don’t know I used to only do 317’s, but I started 508’s so I just need the runbat code that I need to put there…

This doesn’t work either >.>

@echo off
cd …/bin
title Pk Planet
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” -cp . PkPlanet/Server 43594
pause[/quote]That looks right, are those the correct folders?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help 508 Pk Planet Source, with run.bat

item.title: Need help 508 Pk Planet Source, with run.bat
item.dc:creator: @dy3p8ntrkid dy3p8ntrkid
item.description:
@dy3p8ntrkid wrote:

CLASSPATH:
.;CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin;%CLASSPATH%;C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\lib\ext\QTJava.zip

PATH:
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin;C:\Program Files\QuickTime\QTSystem\

try that in your environmental variables…

EDIT/ both of these go in the bottom box on your environmental variables.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help 508 Pk Planet Source, with run.bat

item.title: Need help 508 Pk Planet Source, with run.bat
item.dc:creator: @pk_man_owned pk_man_owned
item.description:
@pk_man_owned wrote:

Finally someone answers, ok I don’t know I used to only do 317’s, but I started 508’s so I just need the runbat code that I need to put there…

This doesn’t work either >.>

@echo off
cd …/bin
title Pk Planet
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” -cp . PkPlanet/Server 43594
pause

@davidi2 wrote:

What on earth… your run.bat setup (if you have properly set your environmental variables) should be:

java CLASSNAME
